content: this legal document discusses the division of property between two individuals mr cl and mr ca it outlines the different real estate units in a building located in municipality castelfidardo including their size value and cadastral data mr cl will receive the first share which includes an urban area warehouse and roof terrace mr ca will receive the second share which includes another urban area and a staircase the document concludes by stating the values of each share and the amount that mr ca is entitled to receive as a balance
